description:
A spacious and multi-purpose tent that’s just the ticket for base camps and car camping. Big Agnes® has adapted the know-how and materials used to make their ultralight tents to making the Big House series. Tall enough to stand up in, it's got plenty of room for rainy-day hangouts for the whole family. The backpack-style carry bag makes lugging gear from the car to the campsite more convenient than ever.

  • All seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (contains no PVC or volatile organic compounds)
  • Colour-coded webbing and buckles for straightforward set-up
  • Quick Stash door keeper makes stowing doors quick and easy
  • 2 large doors with storm flaps and mesh windows for ventilation
  • Built-in gear loft loops, 4 interior mesh pockets, 2 large removable corner pockets and 2 media pockets with cord ports
  • Reflective guylines for nighttime visibility
  • 10 ultralight Dirt Dagger stakes included
  • Available footprint protects the floor of your tent and allows for Shelter Mode, canopy-free set-up (sold separately)
  • Extra-large pole-supported accessory vestibule when you need more space for camp chairs, bikes, dogs and all the extras (sold separately)
  • Fits the Big Agnes Square, Trapezoid, large Trapezoid and Triangle gear lofts (sold separately)
  • Since the Big House tents are large, high-profile tents, we recommend staking out all stake-out points and all guy outs for the most stability, especially in windy conditions
name: Big Agnes Big House 6-Person Tent
